title: Benihana's Hibachi Bounty includes multiple seafood items
statement: Benihana's Hibachi Bounty of the Seas includes shrimp, scallops, snapper, calamari, vegetables and sake wine, served with ginger lime butter.

citations.quote: HIBACHI BOUNTY OF THE SEAS Shrimp, scallops, snapper, calamari, vegetables and sake wine. Served with ginger lime butter.
